import '../styles/Problem.css' import StatPanel from '../components/StatPanel' function Problem() { return (

Building connections can be tough. We get it.

Social anxiety makes building lasting connections challenging for many adults today.

Source: 1. National Institute of Mental Health (NIMH), based on the National Comorbidity Survey Replication (NCS-R). 2. Jefferies P, Ungar M (2020) Social anxiety in young people: A prevalence study in seven countries. PLoS ONE 15(9): e0239133.

) } export default Problem;
